item.title: Hack The Box: Empowering Beginners in Cybersecurity
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "Cybersecurity" , "Ethical Hacking" , "Penetration Testing" , "Hands-On Learning" , "Beginner-Friendly" , "Online Platforms" , "Hack The Box Academy" , "TryHackMe" , "Learning Resources" , "Community Support"
item.description: Discover whether Hack The Box is the right choice for beginners in cybersecurity and explore better alternatives like Hack The Box Academy and TryHackMe.
